hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.command // ""' | grep -qE '^gh pr create|^git push.*origin' && echo 'Tip: Consider running /pr-describe first to generate a PR description' >&2; exit 0

data=$(cat); echo "$data" | jq -r '.stop_hook_active // false' | grep -q 'true' && exit 0; echo "$data" | jq -r '.transcript_path' | xargs -I {} sh -c 'tail -100 "{}" 2>/dev/null | grep -qE "pr-description-expert|pr-critical-reviewer|pr-tech-lead|pr-senior-engineer" && echo "PR workflow agents were used. Remember to review the outputs before creating/updating your PR." >&2'; exit 0
